dict.string: Right Access would like to access your media library for better user experience. Would you agree?
Right Access would like to access your calendar in order to schedule events. Would you agree?
Right Access requires access to your camera for making video calls. Would you agree to give access?
Right Access would like to access your contact in order to get the other Right Access users registered with this app. Would you agree?
Right Access would like to access your current location for better user experience. Would you agree?
Right Access would like to access your current location for better user experience. Would you agree?
Right Access requires access to your microphone for making video calls. Would you agree to give access?
Right Access would like to get permission for motion detection. Would you agree?
Right Access would like to access your photos library to fetch your profile pic to use this app. Would you agree?
Right Access would like to access your speech recognition for better user experience. Would you agree?
